Methods

ReadAllBytesToArray(Stream)

Read the full content of a seekable stream.

public static byte[] ReadAllBytesToArray(this Stream stream)

Parameters

stream Stream

The stream to read.

Returns

byte[]

The full byte content.

Remarks

For a non-seekable stream, use ReadAllRemainingBytesToArray(Stream) instead.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

The stream does not allow seeking, or is too long.

ReadAllBytesToArrayAsync(Stream, CancellationToken)

Read the full content of a seekable stream.

public static Task<byte[]> ReadAllBytesToArrayAsync(this Stream stream, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

stream Stream

The stream to read.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A cancellation token.

Returns

Task<byte[]>

The full byte content.

Remarks

For a non-seekable stream, use ReadAllRemainingBytesToArray(Stream) instead.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

The stream does not allow seeking, or is too long.

ReadBytesToArray(Stream, int)

Read specified length from current position in stream.

public static byte[] ReadBytesToArray(this Stream stream, int length)

Parameters

stream Stream

The stream to read.

length int

The length to read.

Returns

byte[]

The full byte content.

Exceptions

EndOfStreamException

The length specified exceeded the available data in the stream.

ReadToFill(Stream, Span<byte>)

Reads bytes from a stream until the provided buffer is full.

[Obsolete("Use Stream.ReadExactly")]
public static void ReadToFill(this Stream stream, Span<byte> buffer)

Parameters

stream Stream

The stream to read.

buffer Span<byte>

The buffer to read into.

Exceptions

EndOfStreamException

Throws if the stream didn't have enough content to fill the buffer.
